data.title: Parham Hakimi, Esq.

data.text:
What Makes Attorney Parham Hakimi Uniquely Qualified To Represent You?

Parham Hakimi is the founder of Select Law. Parham has focused his legal career helping consumers; whether that is representing injured people get justice or helping individuals get a fresh start. Parham received his bachelor’s degree from the University of Washington and his Juris Doctor from Arizona State University – Sandra Day O’Connor College of Law. Parham previously worked in one of Arizona’s largest personal injury and bankruptcy firms. Working at these two large firms taught him to treat each and every case as if it is his own, rather than just another file on his desk.

Parham has been recognized by the American Academy of Attorneys as a Top 40 Under 40 attorney, a 2021 and 2022 Rising Star by Super Lawyers and the American Institute of Legal Advocates, 5 Star AVVO, Google and Yelp Rating, and received the AVVO Clients’ Choice Award in 2018 and 2019.

Parham is passionate about helping clients get a fresh start and victims who have been wronged by the acts of others. He enjoys swimming and hiking with his rescue dog, Walter. He believes in giving back to the community and spends his free time volunteering with pet rescue organizations and the food bank. Parham speaks four languages, including Farsi, Turkish, Azerbaijani, and English.

Education

JD – Arizona State University

BA – University of Washington

Awards

Rising Star (Super Lawyers) 2021, 2022

Rising Star (American Institute of Legal Advocates) 2018

Top 40 Under 40 (American Academy of Attorneys) 2018

Fundraising Award (Nickelsville Homeless Shelter) 2011

Membership & Associations
